amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __ Each amount made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 5 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce each amount made available this Act by 5%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 292 (Roll no. 594).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 292 (Roll no. 594).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A070) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
